job_points.point: Deliver high-quality, robust production code for a diverse array of projects for Pfizer Inc. (xfn)
Initiated development of a new site using Vue.js framework, which has resulted in an estimated 40% increase in performance.
Provide leadership within engineering department through close collaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship
Developed a PI with form recognition (computer vision) to automate on/off boarding processes, resulting in a 60% reduction in manual work.
Designed and maintained Canada LATAM APAC and new drug launch sites.

Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team of interns, designers, project managers, and engineers on various projects, including creating new brands, design systems, and applications for the organization.
Built and tested a mobile application for educational communication and online learning for more than 4000+ student users.
Engineered and improved major features of FroshLink's customer-facing Android & iOS cross-platform app using Flutter, and Dart.
Led a team of four in designing and developing an organization-wide attendance system based on facial recognition technology.
Designed and implemented a MongoDB-based interface to efficiently collect, process, and store facial data, ensuring data integrity and security.
Built and maintained software documentation sites, contributing to post-deployment support and maintenance to ensure effective communication and continued functionality of the software.
